class SXF_ElemBendHash : public SXF_ElemBucketHash

Types

enum Attributes

KLS
FINT
HGAP

Interface

Public Members
SXF_ElemBendHash()
virtual int index(const char* name) const

Description

The ElemBendHash class implements a bend bucket hash. SXF Bend attribute keys are "kl", "kls", "fint", "hgap", "e1", and "e2".

Member Description

enum Attributes

SXF_ElemBendHash()

Constructor;

virtual int index(const char* name) const

Map an attribute key to its enum value. Return a corresponding enum value or -1.
